process.name: TCP4-2265 Process Signal 1
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:task id="node_10" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="413" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="process_manager" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_16</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_19</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="node_11" name="Intermediate Timer Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_16</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT1M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent>
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_12" name="SignalStartEvent">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:signalEventDefinition signalRef="collection_38_create"/>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_11"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_16" name="" sourceRef="node_11" targetRef="node_10"/>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="node_17" name="Intermediate Timer Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_19</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT1M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_19" name="" sourceRef="node_10" targetRef="node_17"/>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_20" name="Send Email" pm:config="{"emailServer":1,"type":"text","subject":"pablo.barroso@processmaker.com","textBody":"test case signal - intermediate timer","screenRef":null,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":[],"requestRecipients":[],"attachments":[],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_25</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="" sourceRef="node_17" targetRef="node_20"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_23" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_25</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_25" name="" sourceRef="node_20" targetRef="node_23"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:signal id="collection_11_create" name="testSignalProcess create"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="abe_start_handler" name="abe_start_handler"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="start_ldap_sync" name="start_ldap_sync"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="A" name="A"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="collection_38_create" name="222222 create"/>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <dc:Bounds x="300" y="260" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <dc:Bounds x="230" y="200" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <dc:Bounds x="160" y="120" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_14_di" bpmnElement="node_14">
        <di:waypoint x="178" y="138"/>
        <di:waypoint x="248" y="218"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_16_di" bpmnElement="node_16">
        <di:waypoint x="248" y="218"/>
        <di:waypoint x="358" y="298"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_17_di" bpmnElement="node_17">
        <dc:Bounds x="440" y="370" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_19_di" bpmnElement="node_19">
        <di:waypoint x="358" y="298"/>
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="388"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_20_di" bpmnElement="node_20">
        <dc:Bounds x="410" y="470" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_22_di" bpmnElement="node_22">
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="388"/>
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="508"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_23_di" bpmnElement="node_23">
        <dc:Bounds x="460" y="610" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_25_di" bpmnElement="node_25">
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="508"/>
        <di:waypoint x="478" y="628"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Rows
config.helper: The number of rows to provide for input

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:

Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key
